body.name: YAHARBO Black Bookshelf,3 Tier Modern Bookcase with Legs,Bookshelves Wood Storage Shelf, Open Book Shelves Cube Organizer,Freestanding Short Bookcases
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【 Your Art Treasure-Creative Bookshelf 】The black bookshelf is designed with elegant and mysterious black and crisscross partitions, and its unique appearance allows you to enjoy both retro and modern style.Reshape your storage space with YAHARBO’s charming rustic black modern cube bookshelves, making your home/office/school more elegant and stylish.

【 Reliable Materials Create Stable Structure 】The durable 3 tier black book shelf is made of sturdy high-quality wooden board materials with high glossy finish veneer. The shelf is environmentally friendly and has a tough texture. The canted legs with carved wood grains of this standing bookcase are made of thick plastic supported by four metal screws for extra stability.Bring you a new artistic experience and visual impact.

【 Excellent Display Comes From Right Size 】The simple upright and open design of the book shelves can help you to save much more space in your house. This artistic black wood bookshelf can be used as a storage shelf organizer and display shelf rack. Fill this creative display cabinet with your favorites! Choose a best display organizer for your books, CDs, magazines, collections! Bookcases size: 31.5"L x 9.45" W x 43.31" H

【 Thicker Package & Easier installation 】We design the package particularly with thicker foam, firm edges as well as two-tier packaging to protect the bookshelf in good condition upon arriving. In order to make your installation more convenient, the wood black bookcase comes with step-by-step instructions and all marked tool parts.You can put them together as easily as playing a game of blocks.

【 Considerate Details 】All decorative wood cube storage organizer bookshelves come with full unit back pieces to prevent the shelf from wobbling or separating apart.Weight capacity of each open cube shelf is up to 35 lbs.More than a high quality bookshelf,but also a high quality life.
body.description: YAHARBO Cube Geometric Bookshelf - A great way for storage and display at home and in the office. Graceful colors and gentle material recapitulate the comfort and elegance of modern house to be a kind of simplicity and concinnity. The elegant black tones of the shelves will amplify the mysterious, warm atmosphere without stealing the show of your books,and its neutral property can merge with a wide range of interior arrangement. Bookshelf Material: Particle Board Bookshelf Color: Elegant Black Bookshelf Size:31.5"L x 9.45" W x 43.31" H Size of small cubes:11.81" x9.84" Size of large cubes:11.81" x 14.96" Load Capacity of Each Shelf: 35lb（7 Cube bookshelf） Package Contents: 1 x Bookcase , 1 x Assembly Instruction, 1 x Anti-Tip Kit,All installation tool

Pragmatic multifunctional design allows you to feel our care while enjoying Our mission is to bring the temperature of living and the tenderness of life into every room. You who searches for happiness will always find a flash point of your ideal life ​in YAHARBO YAHARBO Cube Geometric Bookshelf - A great way for storage and display at home and in the office. Graceful colors and gentle material recapitulate the comfort and elegance of modern house to be a kind of simplicity and concinnity. The elegant black tones of the shelves will amplify the mysterious, warm atmosphere without stealing the show of your books,and its neutral property can merge with a wide range of interior arrangement. Anti-tipping Device--Bring you a meticulous sense of security, for you I am willing！ Wood Grain Carved Decorative Legs--Whether you install me or not, I will be there to embellish your exquisite life. Time is quiet, I am here waiting for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars attractive and functional
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect book shelf for a baby's room. The unit comes with protective no-tilt hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal of storage for the cost
reviews.reviewText: Competitively priced and all as advertised. Everything fit well during assembly. Assembly was easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bookcase for my son's room. He really likes it. I wish it was a little more stable but once he filled it up it seems good. Worth the price so I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but tippy
reviews.reviewText: Cute bookcase! I won’t be returning but it is pretty light weight and tippy. Be sure to anchor it to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve put a lot of things together in my time, but this bookcase was by far the easiest. Everything was labeled and the directions were very easy to follow. I bought it for my grandson to put in his room to hold his books and toys. He is 7 months old. I like that it came with hardware to attach it to the wall. I didn’t put the legs on it for now as I wanted him to be able to get his toys easily when he begins to crawl. I was very pleased with the bookcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a nice high TV stand
reviews.reviewText: I needed something to put my TV on in my bedroom. I didn't want to mount the TV to the wall and my bed is very high up. I needed to find something wide enough for a 55" TV and high enough I could see the screen laying down. This did the trick. It is also thin. It doesn't stick out from the wall much. I do suggest you use the anchor and secure it to the wall. It is tall and could easily fall over. I like the cubbies. They make nice shelves to display decor or collectibles. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice-looking small bookcase, and relatively easy to assemble. However the materials are cheap and flimsy—the backing is thin veneer and the legs are plastic. The photo fooled me, it looked nicer online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fills the Void
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with product. It is being used for a kids bookshelf and it has helped tremendously with organization.
